named-query.name: findInscriptions
named-query.query: SELECT i.inscriptionId, i.code, i.personId, c.name, s.name FROM DBInscription i, DBCourse c, DBSchool s WHERE i.courseId = c.courseId AND c.schoolId = s.schoolId AND (i.courseId = :courseId OR :courseId IS NULL) AND (locate(concat(',', concat(i.personId, ',')), :personIdList) > 0 OR :personIdList IS NULL) AND (i.code = :code OR :code IS NULL)

named-query.name: countInscriptions
named-query.query: SELECT count(i) FROM DBInscription i, DBCourse c, DBSchool s WHERE i.courseId = c.courseId AND c.schoolId = s.schoolId AND (i.courseId = :courseId OR :courseId IS NULL) AND (locate(concat(',', concat(i.personId, ',')), :personIdList) > 0 OR :personIdList IS NULL) AND (i.code = :code OR :code IS NULL)

named-query.name: loadInscriptionProperties
named-query.query: SELECT ip FROM DBInscriptionProperty ip WHERE ip.inscriptionId = :inscriptionId

named-query.name: removeInscriptionProperties
named-query.query: DELETE FROM DBInscriptionProperty ip WHERE ip.inscriptionId = :inscriptionId

named-query.name: findCourses
named-query.query: SELECT c.courseId, s.name, c.name FROM DBCourse c, DBSchool s WHERE c.schoolId = s.schoolId AND (upper(s.name) LIKE :schoolName OR :schoolName IS NULL) AND (upper(c.name) LIKE :courseName OR :courseName IS NULL) ORDER BY s.name, c.name

named-query.name: countCourses
named-query.query: SELECT count(c) FROM DBCourse c, DBSchool s WHERE c.schoolId = s.schoolId AND (upper(s.name) LIKE :schoolName OR :schoolName IS NULL) AND (upper(c.name) LIKE :courseName OR :courseName IS NULL)

named-query.name: findSchools
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM DBSchool s WHERE (upper(s.code) LIKE :schoolCode OR :schoolCode IS NULL) AND (upper(s.name) LIKE :schoolName OR :schoolName IS NULL) ORDER BY s.name

named-query.name: countSchools
named-query.query: SELECT count(s) FROM DBSchool s WHERE (upper(s.code) LIKE :schoolCode OR :schoolCode IS NULL) AND (upper(s.name) LIKE :schoolName OR :schoolName IS NULL) ORDER BY s.name
